sections.heading: OBLIQUE ACTIONArt. 2044. Insolvency by failure to exercise rightIf an obligor causes or increases his insolvency by failing to exercise a right, the obligee may exercise it himself, unless the right is strictly personal to the obligor
sections.text: For that purpose, the obligee must join in the suit his obligor a
